text: -rBava#ti sauqmyA aqsyA&&*hu#tayO Bavanti juqShantE$&sya dEqvA Ahu#tIrdEqvA vai brahma#nnavadantaq tat paqrNa upA#&*SRuNOth suqSravAq vai nAmaq yasya# parNaqmayI# juqhUrBava#tiq na pAqpa(gg) SlOka(gm)# SRuNOtiq brahmaq vai paqrNO viNmaqrutO&nnaqM ~MviNmA#ruqtO$&SvaqtthO yasya# parNaqmayI# juqhUrBavaqtyA-Sva#t-thyupaqBRud- brahma#NaiqvAnnaqmava# ruqndhE&thOq brahmaiq - [  ]   23
